Main.subtitle: We specialize in architectural designs and project planning for all types of buildings

About.title: About us

meta.title: About us | MaxProjekty
meta.description: Meet the MaxProjekty team, our history, vision and values. A design office focused on quality, innovation and responsibility.

About.subtitle: Meet our team, values and vision.

history.title: Our History
history.text: MaxProjekty was established in 2010 with a vision to provide comprehensive project services at the highest level. Over more than a decade, we have successfully completed hundreds of projects of various sizes.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: Our goal is to be a leader in innovative and sustainable construction solutions that bring value to clients and society.

value1.title: Quality
value1.text: We emphasize precision and detail in every project.

value2.title: Innovation
value2.text: We follow the latest trends and technologies in construction.

value3.title: Responsibility
value3.text: We approach every project with maximum responsibility.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Our mission is to bring clients innovative, sustainable and high-quality solutions in building design. We see every project as an opportunity to create value for society and future generations.

quotes.author: Jan Kovář, investor
quotes.text: Cooperation with MaxProjekty was professional and smooth.

quotes.author: Petra Malá, developer
quotes.text: I appreciate the innovative approach and communication of the team.

member1.name: Ing. Jan Novák
member1.bio: Expert in project management and technical supervision.

member2.name: Ing. Marie Svobodová
member2.bio: Specialist in architectural design and visualization.

member3.name: Ing. Petr Dvořák
member3.bio: Responsible for structural solutions and construction processes.

member4.name: Ing. Anna Černá
member4.bio: Coordinates projects and communication with clients.

cta.title: Join our team!
cta.text: We are looking for new colleagues who want to participate in interesting projects.

hero.title: Join our team
hero.subtitle: We are looking for talented professionals to join our team. Be part of inspiring projects.

flexibility.title: Flexible working hours
flexibility.description: Work anytime and anywhere according to your needs.

projects.title: International projects
projects.description: Participate in interesting projects all over the world.

office.title: Modern offices
office.description: Inspiring work environment with all amenities.

job1.title: Architect / Designer
job1.description: We are looking for a talented architect with experience in modern building design.

job2.title: Project Manager
